name: Dark Astronomy Picture of the Day
description:
v 1.1 - removed picture border, changed the way text colours are assigned, modified visited link colour, modified headline colour.

v 1 - INITIAL RELEASE
black background and subtle gray text makes the Astronomy Picture of the Day "pop"
font changed to sans-serif so it will use your default font.

discussions.name: I absolutely love this style. I've been using APOD
I visit APOD daily for the picture and related exp
